text:
Created attachment 22364
Contains JUnit test class and documents used for testing.

The text contained in the header and footer of an excel 2007 document is not extracted.
Find in attachments the JUnit test class and the documents used for testing.
We expected to extract the words "testdoc" and "test phrase".

Notes on the attached document:

- the documents "classic_Header.xlsx" and "form_Header.xlsx" contain the words "testdoc" and "test phrase" in the header.

- the documents "classic_Footer.xlsx" and "form_Footer.xlsx" contain the words "testdoc" and "test phrase" in the footer


"TestUnitPoi35Filter.java" is the JUnit class.
creator: grizolle_benedicte@emc.com
apache@gagravarr.org
text: Fixed in svn. Turns out there were a few bugs in XSSF header+footer support which needed to be fixed too.
